attributes.action: release the true side effects of the gulf war injections and side effects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want the prime minister to release the true side effects of the injections administered to the 1991 gulf war veterans,and admit that these were dibilitating and fatal,there are thousands of us out here suffering in silence,recognise our plight and assist us with out all the bueurocratic piffle,admit it was   flawed and dangerous and that the proper trials were not carried out or completed and that the NAPS tablets taken were not even registered safe
